name: War of the Four Beasts DEMO
name_original: War of the Four Beasts DEMO
description:
This is a prerelease demo version of a game that is presently in development. Early access builds are available at https://www.patreon.com/kelphas.

War of the Four Beasts is a turn-based strategy game developed using Game Maker Studio 2.

In a far of land, there are two kingdoms, the mountainous kingdom of Valdam and the island kingdom of Chahar, who both lay claim to the shrines dedicated to the Guardian Beasts that protect the land. You play as the young prince of one of these kingdoms, along with his sister, as they become involved in the generations-long struggle between the two kingdoms.
